explains: v. 热烈地说，兴奋地讨论；使热心，使充满热情

sentences.en: I'm not enthuse over my job any more than before.
sentences.cn: 我对工作不像以前那样热心了。

sentences.en: It's hard not to enthuse after this first episode of Alan Wake.
sentences.cn: 完成阿雷你醒醒的第一章后很难不狂喜乱舞。

sentences.en: In particular, it is struggling to find a growth strategy that will enthuse disgruntled shareholders.
sentences.cn: 特别是，它正努力寻找一种可以激发不满的股东们热情的增长策略。
